options.name: alias
options.description: The alias of the new automatic response.

options.name: regex
options.description: The regex of the new automatic response.

options.name: alias
options.description: The alias of the automatic response you want to delete.

options.name: read
options.description: Send the JSON data of a specific or all automatic responses.

options.name: alias
options.description: The alias of what you want to read. Not specifying an alias will list all automatic responses.

options.name: alias
options.description: The alias of the automatic response you want to edit.

options.name: path
options.description: The path of the value you want to edit, separated with dots.

options.name: value
options.description: The JSON value that you want to insert into the path. Not specifying a value will delete the key.
